creator: florian.saller@web.de
text:
If you have a long text without spaces (e.g. a hyperlink) that exceeds the PDF 
page width, this text is not wrapped. So any information exceeding the PDF page 
width is not displayed.

creator: j3322ptm@yahoo.de
text:
Actually that's not really a bug.
Check the FAQ for dealing with this kind of problem
 http://xml.apache.org/fop/faq.html#cells-overflow

creator: florian.saller@web.de
text:
O.k. I agree then, that this is not really a bug. But it is annoyant, so maybe 
it is a suggestion for an enhancement (the wrap-option="wrap" could cause text 
to be wrapped, even if no whitespaces are contained and the block width is 
exceeded). That would be very helpfull for e.g. long hyperlinks.
